mn95:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava kosalesu carikam caramano mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim yena opasadam nama kosalanam brahmanagamo tadavasari.
mn95:1.3: Tatra sudam bhagava opasade viharati uttarena opasadam devavane salavane.
mn95:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena canki brahmano opasadam ajjhavasati sattussadam satinakatthodakam sadhannam rajabhoggam ranna pasenadina kosalena dinnam rajadayam brahmadeyyam.
mn95:3.2: “samano khalu, bho, gotamo sakyaputto sakyakula pabbajito kosalesu carikam caramano mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim opasadam anuppatto, opasade viharati uttarena opasadam devavane salavane.
mn95:3.3: Tam kho pana bhavantam gotamam evam kalyano kittisaddo abbhuggato:
mn95:3.4: ‘itipi so bhagava araham sammasambuddho vijjacaranasampanno sugato lokavidu anuttaro purisadammasarathi sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava’ti.
mn95:3.5: So imam lokam sadevakam samarakam sabrahmakam sassamanabrahmanim pajam sadevamanussam sayam abhinna sacchikatva pavedeti.
mn95:3.6: So dhammam deseti adikalyanam majjhekalyanam pariyosanakalyanam sattham sabyanjanam, kevalaparipunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam pakaseti.
mn95:3.7: Sadhu kho pana tatharupanam arahatam dassanam hoti”ti.
mn95:4.1: Atha kho opasadaka brahmanagahapatika opasada nikkhamitva sanghasanghi ganibhuta uttarenamukha gacchanti yena devavanam salavanam.
mn95:5.1: Tena kho pana samayena canki brahmano uparipasade divaseyyam upagato.
mn95:5.2: Addasa kho canki brahmano opasadake brahmanagahapatike opasada nikkhamitva sanghasanghi ganibhute uttarenamukham yena devavanam salavanam tenupasankamante.
mn95:5.4: “kim nu kho, bho khatte, opasadaka brahmanagahapatika opasada nikkhamitva sanghasanghi ganibhuta uttarenamukha gacchanti yena devavanam salavanan”ti?
mn95:6.1: “Atthi, bho canki, samano gotamo sakyaputto sakyakula pabbajito kosalesu carikam caramano mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim opasadam anuppatto, opasade viharati uttarena opasadam devavane salavane.
mn95:6.2: Tam kho pana bhavantam gotamam evam kalyano kittisaddo abbhuggato:
mn95:6.3: ‘itipi so bhagava araham sammasambuddho vijjacaranasampanno sugato lokavidu anuttaro purisadammasarathi sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava’ti.
mn95:6.5: “Tena hi, bho khatte, yena opasadaka brahmanagahapatika tenupasankama; upasankamitva opasadake brahmanagahapatike evam vadehi:
mn95:6.7: agamentu kira bhonto, cankipi brahmano samanam gotamam dassanaya upasankamissati’”ti.
mn95:6.8: “Evam, bho”ti kho so khatto cankissa brahmanassa patissutva yena opasadaka brahmanagahapatika tenupasankami; upasankamitva opasadake brahmanagahapatike etadavoca:
mn95:6.10: ‘agamentu kira bhonto, cankipi brahmano samanam gotamam dassanaya upasankamissati’”ti.
mn95:7.1: Tena kho pana samayena nanaverajjakanam brahmananam pancamattani brahmanasatani opasade pativasanti kenacideva karaniyena.
mn95:7.3: “canki kira brahmano samanam gotamam dassanaya upasankamissati”ti.
mn95:7.4: Atha kho te brahmana yena canki brahmano tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva cankim brahmanam etadavocum:
mn95:7.5: “saccam kira bhavam canki samanam gotamam dassanaya upasankamissati”ti?
mn95:8.1: “Ma bhavam canki samanam gotamam dassanaya upasankami.
mn95:8.2: Na arahati bhavam canki samanam gotamam dassanaya upasankamitum;
mn95:8.3: samanotveva gotamo arahati bhavantam cankim dassanaya upasankamitum.
mn95:8.4: Bhavanhi canki ubhato sujato matito ca pitito ca samsuddhagahaniko yava sattama pitamahayuga akkhitto anupakkuttho jativadena.
mn95:8.5: Yampi bhavam canki ubhato sujato matito ca pitito ca samsuddhagahaniko yava sattama pitamahayuga akkhitto anupakkuttho jativadena, iminapangena na arahati bhavam canki samanam gotamam dassanaya upasankamitum;
mn95:8.6: samanotveva gotamo arahati bhavantam cankim dassanaya upasankamitum.
mn95:8.8: bhavanhi canki tinnam vedanam paragu sanighanduketubhanam sakkharappabhedanam itihasapancamanam, padako, veyyakarano, lokayatamahapurisalakkhanesu anavayo …pe…
mn95:8.9: bhavanhi canki abhirupo dassaniyo pasadiko paramaya vannapokkharataya samannagato brahmavanni brahmavacchasi akhuddavakaso dassanaya …pe…
mn95:8.10: bhavanhi canki silava vuddhasili vuddhasilena samannagato …pe…
mn95:8.11: bhavanhi canki kalyanavaco kalyanavakkarano poriya vacaya samannagato vissatthaya anelagalaya atthassa vinnapaniya …pe…
mn95:8.12: bhavanhi canki bahunam acariyapacariyo, tini manavakasatani mante vaceti …pe…
mn95:8.13: bhavanhi canki ranno pasenadissa kosalassa sakkato garukato manito pujito apacito …pe…
mn95:8.14: bhavanhi canki brahmanassa pokkharasatissa sakkato garukato manito pujito apacito …pe…
mn95:8.15: bhavanhi canki opasadam ajjhavasati sattussadam satinakatthodakam sadhannam rajabhoggam ranna pasenadina kosalena dinnam rajadayam brahmadeyyam.
mn95:8.16: Yampi bhavam canki opasadam ajjhavasati sattussadam satinakatthodakam sadhannam rajabhoggam ranna pasenadina kosalena dinnam rajadayam brahmadeyyam, iminapangena na arahati bhavam canki samanam gotamam dassanaya upasankamitum;
mn95:8.17: samanotveva gotamo arahati bhavantam cankim dassanaya upasankamitun”ti.
mn95:9.1: Evam vutte, canki brahmano te brahmane etadavoca:
mn95:9.2: “tena hi, bho, mamapi sunatha, yatha mayameva arahama tam samanam gotamam dassanaya upasankamitum;
mn95:9.3: na tveva arahati so bhavam gotamo amhakam dassanaya upasankamitum.
mn95:9.4: Samano khalu, bho, gotamo ubhato sujato matito ca pitito ca samsuddhagahaniko yava sattama pitamahayuga akkhitto anupakkuttho jativadena.
mn95:9.5: Yampi, bho, samano gotamo ubhato sujato matito ca pitito ca samsuddhagahaniko yava sattama pitamahayuga akkhitto anupakkuttho jativadena, iminapangena na arahati so bhavam gotamo amhakam dassanaya upasankamitum;
mn95:9.6: atha kho mayameva arahama tam bhavantam gotamam dassanaya upasankamitum.
mn95:9.7: Samano khalu, bho, gotamo pahutam hirannasuvannam ohaya pabbajito bhumigatanca vehasatthanca …pe…
mn95:9.8: Samano khalu, bho, gotamo daharova samano yuva susukalakeso bhadrena yobbanena samannagato pathamena vayasa agarasma anagariyam pabbajito …pe…
mn95:9.9: Samano khalu, bho, gotamo akamakanam matapitunam assumukhanam rudantanam kesamassum oharetva kasayani vatthani acchadetva agarasma anagariyam pabbajito …pe…
mn95:9.10: Samano khalu, bho, gotamo abhirupo dassaniyo pasadiko paramaya vannapokkharataya samannagato brahmavanni brahmavacchasi akhuddavakaso dassanaya …pe…
mn95:9.11: Samano khalu, bho, gotamo silava ariyasili kusalasili kusalena silena samannagato …pe…
mn95:9.12: Samano khalu, bho, gotamo kalyanavaco kalyanavakkarano poriya vacaya samannagato vissatthaya anelagalaya atthassa vinnapaniya …pe…
mn95:9.13: Samano khalu, bho, gotamo bahunam acariyapacariyo …pe…
mn95:9.14: Samano khalu, bho, gotamo khinakamarago vigatacapallo …pe…
mn95:9.15: Samano khalu, bho, gotamo kammavadi kiriyavadi apapapurekkharo brahmannaya pajaya …pe…
mn95:9.16: Samano khalu, bho, gotamo ucca kula pabbajito asambhinna khattiyakula …pe…
mn95:9.17: Samano khalu, bho, gotamo addha kula pabbajito mahaddhana mahabhoga …pe…
mn95:9.18: Samanam khalu, bho, gotamam tirorattha tirojanapada sampucchitum agacchanti …pe…
mn95:9.19: Samanam khalu, bho, gotamam anekani devatasahassani panehi saranam gatani …pe…
mn95:9.20: Samanam khalu, bho, gotamam evam kalyano kittisaddo abbhuggato:
mn95:9.21: ‘itipi so bhagava araham sammasambuddho vijjacaranasampanno sugato lokavidu anuttaro purisadammasarathi sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava’ti …pe…
mn95:9.22: Samano khalu, bho, gotamo dvattimsamahapurisalakkhanehi samannagato …pe…
mn95:9.23: Samanam khalu, bho, gotamam raja magadho seniyo bimbisaro saputtadaro panehi saranam gato …pe…
mn95:9.24: Samanam khalu, bho, gotamam raja pasenadi kosalo saputtadaro panehi saranam gato …pe…
mn95:9.25: Samanam khalu, bho, gotamam brahmano pokkharasati saputtadaro panehi saranam gato …pe…
mn95:9.26: Samano khalu, bho, gotamo opasadam anuppatto opasade viharati uttarena opasadam devavane salavane.
mn95:9.27: Ye kho te samana va brahmana va amhakam gamakkhettam agacchanti, atithi no te honti.
mn95:9.28: Atithi kho panamhehi sakkatabba garukatabba manetabba pujetabba.
mn95:9.29: Yampi samano gotamo opasadam anuppatto opasade viharati uttarena opasadam devavane salavane, atithimhakam samano gotamo.
mn95:9.30: Atithi kho panamhehi sakkatabbo garukatabbo manetabbo pujetabbo.
mn95:9.31: Iminapangena na arahati so bhavam gotamo amhakam dassanaya upasankamitum;
mn95:9.32: atha kho mayameva arahama tam bhavantam gotamam dassanaya upasankamitum.
mn95:9.33: Ettake kho aham, bho, tassa bhoto gotamassa vanne pariyapunami, no ca kho so bhavam gotamo ettakavanno;
mn95:9.35: Ekamekenapi tena angena samannagato na arahati, so bhavam gotamo amhakam dassanaya upasankamitum;
mn95:9.36: atha kho mayameva arahama tam bhavantam gotamam dassanaya upasankamitunti.
mn95:9.37: Tena hi, bho, sabbeva mayam samanam gotamam dassanaya upasankamissama”ti.
mn95:10.1: Atha kho canki brahmano mahata brahmanaganena saddhim yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
mn95:10.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi.
mn95:11.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhagava vuddhehi vuddhehi brahmanehi saddhim kinci kinci katham saraniyam vitisaretva nisinno hoti.
mn95:11.2: Tena kho pana samayena kapatiko nama manavo daharo vuttasiro solasavassuddesiko jatiya, tinnam vedanam paragu sanighanduketubhanam sakkharappabhedanam itihasapancamanam, padako, veyyakarano, lokayatamahapurisalakkhanesu anavayo tassam parisayam nisinno hoti.
mn95:11.3: So vuddhanam vuddhanam brahmananam bhagavata saddhim mantayamananam antarantara katham opateti.
mn95:11.4: Atha kho bhagava kapatikam manavam apasadeti:
mn95:11.5: “mayasma bharadvajo vuddhanam vuddhanam brahmananam mantayamananam antarantara katham opatetu.
mn95:11.7: Evam vutte, canki brahmano bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn95:11.9: kulaputto ca kapatiko manavo, bahussuto ca kapatiko manavo, pandito ca kapatiko manavo, kalyanavakkarano ca kapatiko manavo, pahoti ca kapatiko manavo bhota gotamena saddhim asmim vacane patimantetun”ti.
mn95:12.2: “addha kho kapatikassa manavassa tevijjake pavacane katha bhavissati.
mn95:12.5: “yada me samano gotamo cakkhum upasamharissati, athaham samanam gotamam panham pucchissami”ti.
mn95:12.6: Atha kho bhagava kapatikassa manavassa cetasa cetoparivitakkamannaya yena kapatiko manavo tena cakkhuni upasamhasi.
mn95:12.10: Atha kho kapatiko manavo bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn95:12.11: “yadidam, bho gotama, brahmananam poranam mantapadam itihitihaparamparaya pitakasampadaya, tattha ca brahmana ekamsena nittham gacchanti:
mn95:13.1: “Kim pana, bharadvaja, atthi koci brahmananam ekabrahmanopi yo evamaha:
mn95:13.5: “Kim pana, bharadvaja, atthi koci brahmananam ekacariyopi, ekacariyapacariyopi, yava sattama acariyamahayugapi, yo evamaha:
mn95:13.9: “Kim pana, bharadvaja, yepi te brahmananam pubbaka isayo mantanam kattaro mantanam pavattaro yesamidam etarahi brahmana poranam mantapadam gitam pavuttam samihitam tadanugayanti tadanubhasanti bhasitamanubhasanti vacitamanuvacenti seyyathidam—atthako vamako vamadevo vessamitto yamataggi angiraso bharadvajo vasettho kassapo bhagu,
mn95:13.14: “Iti kira, bharadvaja, natthi koci brahmananam ekabrahmanopi yo evamaha:
mn95:13.17: natthi koci brahmananam ekacariyopi ekacariyapacariyopi, yava sattama acariyamahayugapi, yo evamaha:
mn95:13.20: yepi te brahmananam pubbaka isayo mantanam kattaro mantanam pavattaro yesamidam etarahi brahmana poranam mantapadam gitam pavuttam samihitam tadanugayanti tadanubhasanti bhasitamanubhasanti vacitamanuvacenti seyyathidam—atthako vamako vamadevo vessamitto yamataggi angiraso bharadvajo vasettho kassapo bhagu, tepi na evamahamsu:
mn95:13.23: Seyyathapi, bharadvaja, andhaveni paramparasamsatta purimopi na passati majjhimopi na passati pacchimopi na passati;
mn95:13.24: evameva kho, bharadvaja, andhavenupamam manne brahmananam bhasitam sampajjati—purimopi na passati majjhimopi na passati pacchimopi na passati.
mn95:13.26: nanu evam sante brahmananam amulika saddha sampajjati”ti?
mn95:14.1: “Na khvettha, bho gotama, brahmana saddhayeva payirupasanti, anussavapettha brahmana payirupasanti”ti.
mn95:14.2: “Pubbeva kho tvam, bharadvaja, saddham agamasi, anussavam idani vadesi.
mn95:14.3: Panca kho ime, bharadvaja, dhamma dittheva dhamme dvedha vipaka.
mn95:14.6: ime kho, bharadvaja, panca dhamma dittheva dhamme dvedha vipaka.
mn95:14.7: Api ca, bharadvaja, susaddahitamyeva hoti, tanca hoti rittam tuccham musa;
mn95:14.8: no cepi susaddahitam hoti, tanca hoti bhutam taccham anannatha.
mn95:14.12: sunijjhayitamyeva hoti, tanca hoti rittam tuccham musa;
mn95:14.13: no cepi sunijjhayitam hoti, tanca hoti bhutam taccham anannatha.
mn95:14.14: Saccamanurakkhata, bharadvaja, vinnuna purisena nalamettha ekamsena nittham gantum:
mn95:15.1: “Kittavata pana, bho gotama, saccanurakkhana hoti, kittavata saccamanurakkhati?
mn95:15.5: iti vadam saccamanurakkhati, na tveva tava ekamsena nittham gacchati:
mn95:15.12: iti vadam saccamanurakkhati, na tveva tava ekamsena nittham gacchati:
mn95:15.14: Ettavata kho, bharadvaja, saccanurakkhana hoti, ettavata saccamanurakkhati, ettavata ca mayam saccanurakkhanam pannapema;
mn95:16.1: “Ettavata, bho gotama, saccanurakkhana hoti, ettavata saccamanurakkhati, ettavata ca mayam saccanurakkhanam pekkhama.
mn95:16.2: Kittavata pana, bho gotama, saccanubodho hoti, kittavata saccamanubujjhati?
mn95:17.1: “Idha, bharadvaja, bhikkhu annataram gamam va nigamam va upanissaya viharati.
mn95:17.2: Tamenam gahapati va gahapatiputto va upasankamitva tisu dhammesu samannesati—
mn95:17.3: lobhaniyesu dhammesu, dosaniyesu dhammesu, mohaniyesu dhammesu.
mn95:17.4: Atthi nu kho imassayasmato tatharupa lobhaniya dhamma yatharupehi lobhaniyehi dhammehi pariyadinnacitto ajanam va vadeyya—
mn95:17.6: passamiti, param va tadatthaya samadapeyya yam paresam assa digharattam ahitaya dukkhayati?
mn95:17.8: ‘natthi kho imassayasmato tatharupa lobhaniya dhamma yatharupehi lobhaniyehi dhammehi pariyadinnacitto ajanam va vadeyya—
mn95:17.10: passamiti, param va tadatthaya samadapeyya yam paresam assa digharattam ahitaya dukkhaya.
mn95:17.11: Tatharupo kho panimassayasmato kayasamacaro tatharupo vacisamacaro yatha tam aluddhassa.
mn95:17.12: Yam kho pana ayamayasma dhammam deseti, gambhiro so dhammo duddaso duranubodho santo panito atakkavacaro nipuno panditavedaniyo;
mn95:18.1: Yato nam samannesamano visuddham lobhaniyehi dhammehi samanupassati tato nam uttari samannesati dosaniyesu dhammesu.
mn95:18.2: Atthi nu kho imassayasmato tatharupa dosaniya dhamma yatharupehi dosaniyehi dhammehi pariyadinnacitto ajanam va vadeyya—
mn95:18.4: passamiti, param va tadatthaya samadapeyya yam paresam assa digharattam ahitaya dukkhayati?
mn95:18.6: ‘natthi kho imassayasmato tatharupa dosaniya dhamma yatharupehi dosaniyehi dhammehi pariyadinnacitto ajanam va vadeyya—
mn95:18.8: passamiti, param va tadatthaya samadapeyya yam paresam assa digharattam ahitaya dukkhaya.
mn95:18.9: Tatharupo kho panimassayasmato kayasamacaro tatharupo vacisamacaro yatha tam adutthassa.
mn95:18.10: Yam kho pana ayamayasma dhammam deseti, gambhiro so dhammo duddaso duranubodho santo panito atakkavacaro nipuno panditavedaniyo;
mn95:19.1: Yato nam samannesamano visuddham dosaniyehi dhammehi samanupassati, tato nam uttari samannesati mohaniyesu dhammesu.
mn95:19.2: Atthi nu kho imassayasmato tatharupa mohaniya dhamma yatharupehi mohaniyehi dhammehi pariyadinnacitto ajanam va vadeyya—
mn95:19.4: passamiti, param va tadatthaya samadapeyya yam paresam assa digharattam ahitaya dukkhayati?
mn95:19.6: ‘natthi kho imassayasmato tatharupa mohaniya dhamma yatharupehi mohaniyehi dhammehi pariyadinnacitto ajanam va vadeyya—
mn95:19.8: passamiti, param va tadatthaya samadapeyya yam paresam assa digharattam ahitaya dukkhaya.
mn95:19.9: Tatharupo kho panimassayasmato kayasamacaro tatharupo vacisamacaro yatha tam amulhassa.
mn95:19.10: Yam kho pana ayamayasma dhammam deseti, gambhiro so dhammo duddaso duranubodho santo panito atakkavacaro nipuno panditavedaniyo;
mn95:20.1: Yato nam samannesamano visuddham mohaniyehi dhammehi samanupassati;
mn95:20.2: atha tamhi saddham niveseti, saddhajato upasankamati, upasankamanto payirupasati, payirupasanto sotam odahati, ohitasoto dhammam sunati, sutva dhammam dhareti, dhatanam dhammanam attham upaparikkhati, attham upaparikkhato dhamma nijjhanam khamanti, dhammanijjhanakkhantiya sati chando jayati, chandajato ussahati, ussahitva tuleti, tulayitva padahati, pahitatto samano kayena ceva paramasaccam sacchikaroti pannaya ca nam ativijjha passati.
mn95:20.3: Ettavata kho, bharadvaja, saccanubodho hoti, ettavata saccamanubujjhati, ettavata ca mayam saccanubodham pannapema;
mn95:21.1: “Ettavata, bho gotama, saccanubodho hoti, ettavata saccamanubujjhati, ettavata ca mayam saccanubodham pekkhama.
mn95:21.2: Kittavata pana, bho gotama, saccanuppatti hoti, kittavata saccamanupapunati?
mn95:21.4: “Tesamyeva, bharadvaja, dhammanam asevana bhavana bahulikammam saccanuppatti hoti.
mn95:21.5: Ettavata kho, bharadvaja, saccanuppatti hoti, ettavata saccamanupapunati, ettavata ca mayam saccanuppattim pannapema”ti.
mn95:22.1: “Ettavata, bho gotama, saccanuppatti hoti, ettavata saccamanupapunati, ettavata ca mayam saccanuppattim pekkhama.
mn95:22.2: Saccanuppattiya pana, bho gotama, katamo dhammo bahukaro?
mn95:22.3: Saccanuppattiya bahukaram dhammam mayam bhavantam gotamam pucchama”ti.
mn95:22.6: Yasma ca kho padahati tasma saccamanupapunati.
mn95:23.1: “Padhanassa pana, bho gotama, katamo dhammo bahukaro?
mn95:23.2: Padhanassa bahukaram dhammam mayam bhavantam gotamam pucchama”ti.
mn95:23.5: Yasma ca kho tuleti tasma padahati.
mn95:24.1: “Tulanaya pana, bho gotama, katamo dhammo bahukaro?
mn95:24.2: Tulanaya bahukaram dhammam mayam bhavantam gotamam pucchama”ti.
mn95:24.5: Yasma ca kho ussahati tasma tuleti.
mn95:25.1: “Ussahassa pana, bho gotama, katamo dhammo bahukaro?
mn95:25.2: Ussahassa bahukaram dhammam mayam bhavantam gotamam pucchama”ti.
mn95:25.4: No cetam chando jayetha, nayidam ussaheyya.
mn95:25.5: Yasma ca kho chando jayati tasma ussahati.
mn95:26.1: “Chandassa pana, bho gotama, katamo dhammo bahukaro?
mn95:26.2: Chandassa bahukaram dhammam mayam bhavantam gotamam pucchama”ti.
mn95:26.4: No cete dhamma nijjhanam khameyyum, nayidam chando jayetha.
mn95:26.5: Yasma ca kho dhamma nijjhanam khamanti tasma chando jayati.
mn95:27.1: “Dhammanijjhanakkhantiya pana, bho gotama, katamo dhammo bahukaro?
mn95:27.2: Dhammanijjhanakkhantiya bahukaram dhammam mayam bhavantam gotamam pucchama”ti.
mn95:27.4: No cetam attham upaparikkheyya, nayidam dhamma nijjhanam khameyyum.
mn95:27.5: Yasma ca kho attham upaparikkhati tasma dhamma nijjhanam khamanti.
mn95:28.1: “Atthupaparikkhaya pana, bho gotama, katamo dhammo bahukaro?
mn95:28.2: Atthupaparikkhaya bahukaram dhammam mayam bhavantam gotamam pucchama”ti.
mn95:28.4: No cetam dhammam dhareyya, nayidam attham upaparikkheyya.
mn95:28.5: Yasma ca kho dhammam dhareti tasma attham upaparikkhati.
mn95:29.1: “Dhammadharanaya pana, bho gotama, katamo dhammo bahukaro?
mn95:29.2: Dhammadharanaya bahukaram dhammam mayam bhavantam gotamam pucchama”ti.
mn95:29.4: No cetam dhammam suneyya, nayidam dhammam dhareyya.
mn95:29.5: Yasma ca kho dhammam sunati tasma dhammam dhareti.
mn95:30.1: “Dhammassavanassa pana, bho gotama, katamo dhammo bahukaro?
mn95:30.2: Dhammassavanassa bahukaram dhammam mayam bhavantam gotamam pucchama”ti.
mn95:30.4: No cetam sotam odaheyya, nayidam dhammam suneyya.
mn95:30.5: Yasma ca kho sotam odahati tasma dhammam sunati.
mn95:31.1: “Sotavadhanassa pana, bho gotama, katamo dhammo bahukaro?
mn95:31.2: Sotavadhanassa bahukaram dhammam mayam bhavantam gotamam pucchama”ti.
mn95:31.4: No cetam payirupaseyya, nayidam sotam odaheyya.
mn95:31.5: Yasma ca kho payirupasati tasma sotam odahati.
mn95:32.1: “Payirupasanaya pana, bho gotama, katamo dhammo bahukaro?
mn95:32.2: Payirupasanaya bahukaram dhammam mayam bhavantam gotamam pucchama”ti.
mn95:32.5: Yasma ca kho upasankamati tasma payirupasati.
mn95:33.1: “Upasankamanassa pana, bho gotama, katamo dhammo bahukaro?
mn95:33.2: Upasankamanassa bahukaram dhammam mayam bhavantam gotamam pucchama”ti.
mn95:33.4: No cetam saddha jayetha, nayidam upasankameyya.
mn95:33.5: Yasma ca kho saddha jayati tasma upasankamati.
mn95:34.1: “Saccanurakkhanam mayam bhavantam gotamam apucchimha, saccanurakkhanam bhavam gotamo byakasi;
mn95:34.2: tanca panamhakam ruccati ceva khamati ca tena camha attamana.
mn95:34.3: Saccanubodham mayam bhavantam gotamam apucchimha, saccanubodham bhavam gotamo byakasi;
mn95:34.4: tanca panamhakam ruccati ceva khamati ca tena camha attamana.
mn95:34.5: Saccanuppattim mayam bhavantam gotamam apucchimha, saccanuppattim bhavam gotamo byakasi;
mn95:34.6: tanca panamhakam ruccati ceva khamati ca tena camha attamana.
mn95:34.7: Saccanuppattiya bahukaram dhammam mayam bhavantam gotamam apucchimha, saccanuppattiya bahukaram dhammam bhavam gotamo byakasi;
mn95:34.8: tanca panamhakam ruccati ceva khamati ca tena camha attamana.
mn95:34.9: Yamyadeva ca mayam bhavantam gotamam apucchimha tamtadeva bhavam gotamo byakasi;
mn95:34.10: tanca panamhakam ruccati ceva khamati ca tena camha attamana.
mn95:34.11: Mayanhi, bho gotama, pubbe evam janama:
mn95:34.12: ‘ke ca mundaka samanaka ibbha kanha bandhupadapacca, ke ca dhammassa annataro’ti?
mn95:34.13: Ajanesi vata me bhavam gotamo samanesu samanapemam, samanesu samanapasadam, samanesu samanagaravam.
mn95:35.2: upasakam mam bhavam gotamo dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
